line.text: Whoever hath her wish thou hast thy will
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And Will to boot and Will in over-plus
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: More than enough am I that vex thee still
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To thy sweet will making addition thus
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Wilt thou whose will is large and spacious
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Not once vouchsafe to hide my will in thine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Shall will in others seem right gracious
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And in my will no fair acceptance shine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The sea all water yet receives rain still
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And in abundance addeth to his store
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So thou being rich in will add to thy will
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: One will of mine to make thy large will more
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Let no unkind no fair beseechers kill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Think all but one and me in that one Will
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
